text: The remembrance of God-His mercy, by which He rejects and has mercy on whom He will. So in Genesis: "The Lord remembered Noah; "[fn-121-P12155_3571189:134-nf] and in another passage: "The Lord hath remembered His people."[fn-121-P12156_3571273:135-nf]
title: Melito, the Philosopher.
author: Memoirs of Edessa
